package org.apache.http.impl.client.cache;
 
  
import java.io.File;

import org.apache.http.annotation.Immutable;
import org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient;

import ...
 
 
/** * Factory methods for {@link CloseableHttpClient} instances * capable of client-side caching. * * @since 4.3 */
/*...*/
41  
@Immutable
42  
public class CachingHttpClients {
 
44  
    private CachingHttpClients() {
45  
        super();
46  
    }
 
 
/** * Creates builder object for construction of custom * {@link CloseableHttpClient} instances. */
/*...*/
52  
    public static CachingHttpClientBuilder custom() {
53  
        return CachingHttpClientBuilder.create();
54  
    }
 
 
/** * Creates {@link CloseableHttpClient} instance that uses a memory bound * response cache. */
/*...*/
60  
    public static CloseableHttpClient createMemoryBound() {
61  
        return CachingHttpClientBuilder.create().build();
62  
    }
 
 
/** * Creates {@link CloseableHttpClient} instance that uses a file system * bound response cache. * * @param cacheDir location of response cache. */
/*...*/
70  
    public static CloseableHttpClient createFileBound(final File cacheDir) {
71  
        return CachingHttpClientBuilder.create().setCacheDir(cacheDir).build();
72  
    }
 
74  
}
